lines.text: Maybe a bullet didn't go in... it came out!
He accidentally swallowed a bullet, and it needed to make an <c=#FF6000>Emergency Exit!</c>
Yeah, let's adjust the hypothesis for this one.
It'd be like, <c=#FF00FF>''how can a bullet do magic'', ''how can a bullet have tattoos'', ''how could a bullet set a fire''...</c>
